byline.contributor: Trip Gabriel and Sarah Wheaton contributed reporting from New York.

abstract: Texas Gov Rick Perry's suggestion that he might skip some of the Republican presidential debates has raised the question of whether there are too many debates in the Republican primary contest.
snippet: The hint from Gov. Rick Perry of Texas that he will skip future debates has raised a question: How many are too many?
lead_paragraph: The hint from Gov. Rick Perry of Texas that he will skip future debates has raised a question: How many are too many?

headline.main: Perry Ignites Discussion Over Debates He May Skip
headline.print_headline: Perry Ignites Discussion Over Debates He May Skip
headline.seo: Perry Raises Question About G.O.P. Debate Calendar
